title: Program Validation Response Schema
description: Defines the validation results returned by the program when requested for program prerequisites

validationResults.title: Validation Results
validationResults.description: A list of errors or success messages in response to validating the prerequisites

key.title: Prerequisite Key
key.description: The key of the prerequisite associated with the listed validation results

results.title: Prerequisite Validation Results
results.description: The results associated with the validation prerequisite key

validationResult.title: Prerequisite Validation Result
validationResult.description: A result of validating a prerequisite

status.title: Validation Status
status.description: A status indicating whether the validation was successful or the severity of the error

message.title: Message
message.description: A message indicating why the validation was successful or not
